categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Raimu was a female Zabrak Jedi Master who served the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic during the Cold War against the resurgent Sith Empire.

Raimu appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a gear vendor for one of the Jedi classes. She was later removed as a vendor and NPC in Game Update 5.0 on November 29, 2016, which retired the PvP and PvE gear vendors in favor of the Command system. Nonetheless, she remains in the game, as her character model is used as part of the background environment in the redesigned fleet areas.
